metadata.exif:ImageDescription: Mexico City, 2013, Portrait of Mar....a Isabel, a resident at Casa Xochiquetzal, in her bedroom. The former sex worker, who grew up in Michoac....n, ran away from home at the age of nine after a year in which her father .......used her........ When she got to the Mexico City bus station, she met a woman selling tamales who offered her a home and education. Mar....a Isabel nearly finished her studies to become a teacher, but when her caretaker died, she became a sex worker (at the young age of 17). She now reads, writes poetry, embroiders and makes earrings and bracelets.
